Description:
Alert when a user has performed an export to a search using 'New-ComplianceSearchAction' with the '-Export' flag. This detection will detect PST export even if the 'eDiscovery search or exported' alert is disabled in the O365.This rule will apply to ExchangePowerShell usage and from the cloud.

Author: Nikita Khalimonenkov
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PST Export Alert Using New-ComplianceSearchAction
Query: sourcetype='m365-threat_management' eql select * from _source_ where eventsource = 'securitycompliancecenter' and (payload like '%new-compliancesearchaction%' and payload like '%export%' and payload like '%pst%')
